repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a commentary on the Ratirahasya of kokkokakavi. Only 1v has ink and rest of the text is only incised. Number 19 and 128 are written in roman in blue chalk and dīpikā in devanagari in pencil on the front folio.

msItem.title: Ratirahasyavyākhyā
msItem.author: Kāñcinātha
msItem.incipit: 1v 1 yenākāri prasabhamacirādarddhanārīśvaratvaṃ dagdhenāpi tripurajayino (jyotiṣaca (ink faint so not legible)) kṣuṣeṇa 1v 2 indromiitraṃ sa jasait mudāndhāma vāmapracāro devaśrīmānbhavarasaṃbuṣaṃ daivataṃcittrajjanmā
msItem.explicit: 29v 4 kālena tṛptā bhavati a(yaṃ) kramapuruṣeṣu viparito bhavatītyarthaḥ
msItem.finalRubric: 29v 4 iti śīlpāvakīryakokkakakṛte ra(ti) 29v 5 rahasye kāñcīnāthakṛta dīpikāyāṃ sāmānyadharmādhikāro nāma caturthaparicchedaḥ 29v 6 hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu

support.p: Thin palm leaf is used as cover.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin.
supportDesc.condition: good preservation with wormholes, delicate leaves.

handNote.desc: Only 1v is with ink and rest of the text is only incised.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ in left margin on 1v.

listBibl.bibl: Rati rahasya the secret of sexual pleasure by Ravi kokkaka with the commentary dīpikā by kāñcinātha Edited with critical notes by Devadatta Sharma pub: 1922 Kashi:Preeman and Co.

encodingDesc.p: Space is added to separate words.

TEI.text: 1v 1 yenākāri prasabhamacirādarddhanārīśvaratvaṃ dagdhenāpi tripurajayino (jyotiṣaca (ink faint so not legible)) kṣuṣeṇa 1v 2 indromiitraṃ sa jasait mudāndhāma vāmapracāro devaśrīmānbhavarasaṃbuṣaṃ daivataṃcittrajjanmā 1v 3 native gaṇapatiśaṃ kokkokakṛtasya ratirahasyasya kriyate darśitabhāvā kāñcīnāthena dīpi 1v 4 kāsudiyā .. iha hi kāvyanāṭakālaṃkāraprabhṛti sakalāniṣṇāto vāgvilāsa… 29v 4 kālena tṛptā bhavati a(yaṃ) kramapuruṣeṣu viparito bhavatītyarthaḥ iti śīlpāvakīryakokkakakṛte ra(ti) 29v 5 rahasye kāñcīnāthakṛta dīpikāyāṃ sāmānyadharmādhikāro nāma caturthaparicchedaḥ 29v 6 hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu
